channel.title: Runescape in the years of 2001-2007
channel.description:
Sup Mopar, I made this topic because I actuelly have a question on why people are making RSPS private servers. I always thought that Runescape was the best in the years of 1995-2007. Some people are proving me wrong and some are proving me right. Actuelly I wanted to ask the people: Why are you guys making RSPS servers, because when I start making a RSPS server, I always think about the times that Runescape was fantastic! When the times it didn't lagg, the times when I loved the whip emote and the sales at Camelot Bank, the times I got scammed for 1 mil because I didnt see that the other player took his whip away and accepted very fast. I want those times back, most people on the server status page have an edited server, like chieving stalls behind the bank, or just modified places in Varrock or Lumbridge, I want a really nice server which includes almost all things and the economy of Runescape in the years 2001-2007, I hope someone will give me it, I will also help the people who wants to make this. Good Luck :)
[b]Few exaples of Runescape in the good old times:[/b] [img]http://images.mmosite.com/my/upload/10/13/iulya/09/1115/2009111543954_538.jpg[/img] [img]http://play-free-online-games.com/listmachine/uploads/image_runescape_1.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.worldsinmotion.biz/runescapess5.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.immortalfighters.net/pictures/runescape.jpg[/img] [img]http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs29/f/2008/173/4/9/Runescape_4_random_outfits_by_gabeson.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.dragonsflame.co.uk/runescape.jpg[/img] [img]http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_LO1vwYKobTA/SwT9aRD4DLI/AAAAAAAAALs/wqBFle_3h5c/s1600/runescape.png[/img] [img]http://shane.rsbandb.com/tdb/wp-content/mob268.jpg[/img]
[b]Those pictures aren't made by me, I dont take credit for making those pictures[/b] [b]I feel sick when I think about the old times on Runescape where everything was such perfecter than now[/b]

item.title: Runescape in the years of 2001-2007
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:83, topic:357454”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=453966.msg3848840#msg3848840 date=1323838689]

I didn’t think runescape was created in 95.

Your right, as read in the previous posts I believe it started 98’. (DeviousMud)
99’ Rsc

Rsc went live January 2001… Jagex has been around since 98/99…

Jagex has actually been around since pre-95, but not as an actual business entity. Back then it stood for Java Audio and Graphics EXtension, if I recall correctly.
[/quote]
They don’t do very good audio or graphics, I bet that’s why they changed it to Java Gaming Experts.[/quote]
for not having access to hardware for the majority of their existence, they did pretty well.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape in the years of 2001-2007
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Theres gonna be things you don’t like Rs, i bet if you started the rs back in 2007 you’d be like wtf for certain parts.
Rs is evolving, you can’t let a game just sit in the same place for 5 years.
Stop moaning its getting annoying now, yes Rs was fun back in those days but it needs to keep evolving or enjoy bankruptcy. Also, it should be aiming to get new players rather than reattract old players as it wants to expand not just sit there.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

I personally think 2004-2007 were the best years… If they would of left everything alone they would still have 200k+ players online at a time instead of 90k-150k they destroyed it, then tried to fix it with adding what they removed but making it not the same… They messed up a lot, and I hate that they have to revamp it so it will be back to how everyone wants it.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape in the years of 2001-2007
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Damn I really miss the old days :(. I remember my mate got scammed in the duel arena. He fight against a higher level person that is really bad at melee and my mate kills him like 5x on my account, Then he decide to put our rune platelegs for a stake against full rune from him. The duel starts he pulls out ice barrage after few spells and we died, I WAS SO FUCKING MAD ON HIM. (40k was alot to me then :()

Read full topic

The GE is veryu helpfull but is a bit “not needed” what you had to do was go to world 1 or 2 and spam like a bitch of what you needed in varrock. [GE killed General stores =( ] I do like the GE though. if they had it back in 05 when I started that would have been nice.
[/quote]

Used to be a bitch back then, only being able to buy 1,000 at a time, then spend an hour finding another person to sell you another set…[/quote]

item.title: Runescape in the years of 2001-2007
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I used to love those years, well 2005 - 2007, I was too young to be allowed to play online before '05, but yea. Those couple years were the best, everyone talked, scams happened, but it made you feel like you were actually part of the game and that you meant something to the economy.

You used to have to work hard for the cash you had, spend 2 hours mining a few hundred iron ore, then taking them to the furnace and only having half come out as bars, then spending half an hour in front of falador bank trying to sell the bars. Good times.

I remember when merching was actually dangerous, that if you didn’t pay attention you lost your stuff, and if you paid attention, you made tons of cash. I remember when people would stand in the bank saying, selling archer ring 2m, then someone would say, buying archer ring 3.5m like 15 squares away.

That was a fun game, now it’s all simplified and turning into every other BAD game.

It still is fun, but it’s lost its competitiveness.

Read full topic
